ygData.subject: RE: Semi-off topic question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No chance. There s no way to verify that the quest was done properly or done at all.
ygData.messageBody:
> I was curious if anyone had had any luck getting quest items that went
> into the Quest Black Hole (i.e. you gave the right items, but got
> nothing back) back. I'm asking because a friend had this happen with
> his crafted gauntlets while trying to do the resize quest. The Guide
> (I'm assuming it was a newer or lower level guide, not a senior) told
> him that there was nothing that they could do, after making him wait
> for almost an hour (but that's another gripe) and that there was no GM
> on anyway. Is there any chance he might get his gauntlets back?

No chance. There's no way to verify that the quest was done
properly or done at all.
